name: Danilo Catone
aboutMeHeadline: I'm Danilo Catone, a Data Scientist, Flutter developer and Technical Writer.
aboueMeDetails: I'm a Final Year Computer Science student enrolled in COMSATS University, Islamabad. I have been developing mobile apps for over 2 years now. I have worked in teams for various startups and helped them in launching their prototypes and got valuable learning experience. I'm a former Google DSC lead and also CEO/Co-Founder Flutter Islamabad, Pakistan.
